======================================================
TEST: +fast, -fast, and fast<x
------------------------------------------------------
This line goes into section abc
------------------------------------------------------

======================================================
TEST: fast[x]
------------------------------------------------------
abc.section = abc
abc.text = This line goes into section abc

------------------------------------------------------

======================================================
TEST: fast>>n, fast<<n
------------------------------------------------------
123456789: indention:0
    56789: indention:4
123456789: indention:0
------------------------------------------------------

    This one by 4

------------------------------------------------------
a1 = joe@fast._subChar2@aol.com; ed@fast._subChar2@juggler.net

------------------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------------------

======================================================
TEST: fast.off, fast.on
------------------------------------------------------
This line is printed
------------------------------------------------------

TEST: fast.printWithIndent
------------------------------------------------------
//.-fast  ## this is a pop
This @1+2@ is an expression substitution
------------------------------------------------------

======================================================
TEST: fast.removeLastChar (chomp or rstrip)
------------------------------------------------------
line: a, // trailing comment a
line: b, // trailing comment b
line: c  // trailing comment c
------------------------------------------------------
x: # trailing comment x
y: # trailing comment y
z  # trailing comment z
------------------------------------------------------
